name: Intract
highlight: On-chain marketing platform for you to analyze and grow your users.
summary: Intract is a one-stop platform to supercharge your product and marketing. The first-of-its-kind solution helps you analyze & grow your on-chain users as well as engage your off-chain community. After successful case studies with 50+ marquee projects across DeFi, GameFi & NFT verticals, Intract has plans to advance further and increase its functionality. This makes Intract the go-to solution for analytics and marketing for any web3 project.
